meanings.definition: Not involving or related to sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: The friendship between them was purely nonsexual.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonsexual topics of conversation.
meanings.sent3: The nonsexual jokes at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His nonsexual approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The room had a calm, nonsexual atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: Their relationship was nonsexual but full of love.
meanings.sent2: He had a nonsexual affection for his pet.
meanings.sent3: The nonsexual cat seemed uninterested in mating.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsexual gaze conveyed warmth and care.
meanings.sent5: The nonsexual bond between them was unbreakable.
